remarks: A product of a singleton is the term.  A version of ~ prodsnf using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
prodsnf.1 $e |- F/_ k B $.
prodsnf.2 $e |- ( k = M -> A = B ) $.
prodsnf $p |- ( ( M e. V /\ B e. CC ) -> prod_ k e. { M } A = B ) $.
$d M k $.
$d V k $.
